name: Strait Jacket Down
description:
An adrenaline VR shooter for the Oculus Go.

Plot: Summer 1974. Woods of Gloomyhill. During a trip organized by the Graham Asylum, a bunch of inmates kills the guards and takes the nurses hostage, then occupy an abandoned amusement park, inside the woods.  In the role of Special Agent Wesley Lamoon, you will break into the complex, rescue the hostages and defeat the rioters.
